title: Employee Role Change
description: An employee is moving from the Sales department to the Finance department. An IAM analyst must update their access accordingly.

tasks.description: Receive the role change notification from HR.
Remove the user from the 'Sales' security group, revoking their access to the CRM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully revokes the old, unnecessary permissions.

tasks.description: Add the user to the 'Finance' security group, granting them access to the accounting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully grants the new, required permissions, ensuring a smooth transition for the user.
